main event: An unidentified object was observed moving from east to west with red and orange-white colors in October 1953.
interesting points: The observation lasted between 10 to 15 minutes., One of the red objects went out of sight to the west and then returned., Another object disappeared to the east while a white object remained visible., There are mentions of the object being lower than ground level., The witness speculated that it might have been an ordinary aircraft.
